Reviews.Title: Simplified for usage in severe conditions
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Amazing product, easy to use, no complications. Ordered it from Amazon and surprisngly it shipped and arrived quite early.Pros -  easy to transfer photo data to PCs and other devices  location information can be added to photo data  this makes it ideal disaster situations & construction data management  easy wi-fi connectionCons - do not drop as it adversely affects performance(although manual claims contrary)

ProductInfo.Name: Ricoh Caplio 500SE Digital Camera with Bluetooth
